subject: Track and Field
Doping (Sports)
Bribery and Kickbacks
lead_paragraph: The authorities investigating Lamine Diack, the former president of the I.A.A.F., said that one of Diack’s sons was also “very active” in a “system of corruption.”
snippet: The authorities investigating Lamine Diack, the former president of the I.A.A.F., said that one of Diack’s sons was also “very active” in a “system of corruption.”
